name: Project Lighthouse
description:
Move - WASD
Interact - E
Teleport - T

The web build is not recommended, but it is included for non-windows users. If you can, download the zip provided to play natively on windows. 

Created by: 

Harys Labrou  - 3D Modelling
Nick A. Spyrakos - Creative Design, Programming
Chris Galeos - Programming
Dimitris Panagiotopoulos - Design, Narrative, 3D
Yorgos Skote Georgakis - Sound Design
